rules.active: Throw an object accurately at a target up to 5 metres away.

details.flavour: Go ahead, toss your hat in the ring.

rules.active: Throw an object accurately at a target up to 12 metres away.

details.flavour: If you're going to throw in the towel, at least do it properly.

rules.active: Throw an object accurately as far as you want.

details.flavour: I want this thing gone, understand? I want to never see it again.

rules.active: Throw an object as far as you want. It cannot be stopped.

details.flavour: I guess in a way, we're all still chasing it.

rules.active: Deal 3 damage to a visible character with a painful bolt of electricity

details.flavour: A smile costs less than electricity, but gives much light

rules.active: Deal 4 damage and stun up to 2 visible characters.

details.flavour: "No." - Dr. Reed, in response to a question on whether or not a human should be able to shoot lightning out of their hands.

rules.active: Deal 6 damage and stun to up to 6 visible characters.

details.flavour: "Ouch" - Dr. Reed and his 5 assistants.

rules.active: Cause a complete blackout in a 100 kilometre radius. Draw 3 copies of Fork Lightning

details.flavour: If your hate could be turned into electricity, it would light up the whole world.

rules.active: Ignite a small object within 3 metres.

details.flavour: Including but not limited to a friend's new article of clothing, letters from their loved ones, and paper money.

rules.active: Hurl a flaming ball of hot embers at a visible object.

details.flavour: Time for a game of hot potato!

rules.active: Deal 15 damage and set fire to all flammable objects within 6 metres.

details.flavour: The best part is that nice campfire smell.

rules.active: Summon a brick of material which burns violently forever when set on fire.

details.flavour: The fire in our hearts will never burn out

rules.active: Jump up 3 metres.

details.flavour: Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall.

rules.active: Jump 25 metres into the air.

details.flavour: Sometimes all you need is a big leap of faith.

rules.active: Hover up to 2 metres off the ground until you lose concentration.

details.flavour: Rise above earthly ambition.

rules.active: Pick a visible object. It becomes moist.

details.flavour: I think I'm going to need a change of clothes.

rules.active: Cause everything within 2 metres of a visible object to become saturated with water.
rules.passive: Deal double damage when attacking wet enemies

details.flavour: My plan: complete. Their day: ruined.

rules.active: Summon 50 thousand litres of water to a visible location.

details.flavour: 'Wet' would be an understatement

rules.active: A Tsunami breaks over the play area from a cardinal direction of your choice.

details.flavour: Nature has a myriad of weapons to combat human arrogance.

rules.active: Change the result of a roll by 2.

details.flavour: I can't see him, but I know he's there.

rules.active: Re-roll a d20.

details.flavour: He will save us from our mortal errors.

rules.active: Describe a religious vision. Pick a visible NPC to experience it.

details.flavour: He lives deep in the hearts of all men.

rules.active: Cause all players to critically succeed on their next d20 roll.

details.flavour: The light will shine bright upon the chosen.

rules.active: Cure the ailment of a visible character, or heal them 8.

details.flavour: Treats an upset stomach, a broken heart, or a pierced lung

rules.active: Heal a visible character 15. They can move twice as fast for the remainder of the session.
rules.passive: Run twice as fast while carrying friendly characters.

details.flavour: The best medicine is running far away from things which hurt you.

rules.active: Restore a visible character to maximum health. Their maximum health permanently increases by 10 and they grow 3 feet taller.

details.flavour: I hope you don't mind if I make some improvements while I'm in here

rules.active: Revive a dead character.

details.flavour: If man is to play god, he ought to be a kind one.

rules.active: Take no damage from the next attack targeting you.

details.flavour: I barely felt that! Who taught you how to punch?

rules.active: The next amount of damage dealt to you is also dealt to your attacker.
rules.passive: Thrown objects bounce off of you with equal force.

details.flavour: Let's see how you like it!.

rules.active: The next amount of damage dealt to you is also dealt to your attacker instead.

details.flavour: I am rubber, and you are glue.

rules.active: Name a character. They can no longer deal damage to you.

details.flavour: "It's futile. I've already analyzed all of your moves." - 5-Year-Old Jacob, Yellow Belt

rules.active: You can attack two additional times on your turn.

details.flavour: Before they even realized what happened, another punch sent them flying.

rules.active: You can attack four additional times on your turn.

details.flavour: Their defense won't last forever. Strike, and strike again.

rules.active: You can make twice times as many attacks as you otherwise would on your turn.

details.flavour: Every fighter has gaps between attacks which can be exploited. Just make sure to take them after your opponent is dead.

rules.active: Take X damage. You can attack X times on your turn.

details.flavour: Punches, kicks, and jabs stretch out before me into endless infinity, a fractal of iron striking limbs.

rules.active: Throw a visible character up into the air.

details.flavour: He should've worn a windbreaker.

rules.active: Throw any number of characters in a 3 metre radius into the air.
rules.passive: Whenever you throw a character in the air, you can also throw them 8 metres in any direction

details.flavour: You look like a birthday candle.

rules.active: Throw any number of visible characters up into the air.

details.flavour: Rise, rise towards the heavens.

rules.active: A powerful hurricane is summoned over the play area for as long as you want.

details.flavour: It is rare for an area to know such devastation.

rules.active: Summon an impenetrable column of light in adjacent square metre for 5 minutes.

details.flavour: "Quit the mime act and c'mon! We're getting out of here!" - Barry the Bandit

rules.active: Summon a copy of any NPC.

details.flavour: "I hated the man so much I made a point of killing him twice" - R.J. Alabaster, Deranged Cardmaster
